dublin_core.dcvalue: The Women and eHealth Study 2010 2012 is conducted with the vision to constitute a Millennia 2015 powerful demonstration of women empowerment in the arena of eHealth and telemedicine through digital solidarity and gender equity The overall objective is to stimulate more women to use advanced technologies combined with innovative integrated collaborative leadership programs The article describes the study and the subsequent networks WeTelemed and WeObservatory conducted by women in developing countries with the ambition to reach the populations living in isolated communities
Made available in DSpace on 2020-02-07T13:31:53Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 0 Previous issue date: 2014-11-21
[The Millennia 2015 women and eHealth Study 2010-2012: networks and innovative programs].
